name: Endless mahjong
description:
Endless Mahjong is truly endless! Connect identical stones together to clear the playing field and go to the next level. The game will continue to generate new levels for you as much as you want, whether it's 10, 100 or 1000 playing fields! And all this accompanied by pleasant music and meditative gameplay for true connoisseurs of the genre

Peculiarities:
- Nice graphics
- Nice soundtrack from DOS-88
